mapper.select: SELECT a.number ,a.groupname ,a.regDate ,(select count(aa.number) from code aa where 1=1 and aa.deleteNY = 0 and aa.codegroup_number = a.number) as xCount ,a.mdfcnDate ,a.deleteNY FROM codegroup a WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.number DESC
SELECT a.number ,a.groupname ,a.regDate ,a.mdfcnDate ,a.deleteNY FROM codegroup a WHERE 1=1 AND a.number = #{number}
mapper.update: UPDATE codegroup SET deleteNY = 1 WHERE number = #{number}
